name: The Adventures of Chico and Grandé
name_original: The Adventures of Chico and Grandé
description:
The Adventures of Chico and Grandé is a co-op top-down adventure game starring two Mexican Luchadores, Chico and Grandé.
The evil Baron von Ostrich and his gang have taken over the town, and it is up to Chico and Grandé to dash, smash and crash all over the place to liberate thier home and save the day!

To view the development of the game, visit  https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL96mt8rcsyPIbLwYnOrzc8zqxl8URAGok

The Adventures of Chico and Grandé requires one player to be on Keyboard and the other on Controller. Once the game is loaded, to select character, Keyboard should press Spacebar and Controller should press A.
Please note, the game is currently in early access, and currently features only basic audio, a Tutorial and Chapter 1. Feedback is very much appreciated.

The Adventures of Chico and Grandé is for my Games Proposal as part of my third year studying at the University of Central Lancashire.
UCLan Games Design: https://gamescourse.co.uk/
Music: https://www.bensound.com
